media:group.media:title: Context Sensitivity
media:group.media:description:
This video presents theories about general game design concepts. It’s not meant to prescribe a set of ideals which all games must follow. However valuable any guideline might be, it’s always (or almost always) possible to imagine a game which is made better by ignoring such considerations. A great game cannot necessarily be made just by applying a set of principles.
I don’t know if/when I’ll be making another video but if you enjoyed this one and would like to support me, you can make a pledge. There’s no reward for doing so but this video wouldn’t exist without the support of my patrons.
https://www.patreon.com/matthewmatosis

media:group.media:title: Meta Microvideos
media:group.media:description:
You decide to read the video description and find it predictably meta. It warns you that the video contains major spoilers for The Witness, moderate spoilers for Metal Gear Solid 2, Axiom Verge and Katamari Damacy. It also has spoilers for Matthewmatosis, whatever that means.
The description then goes on to list a series of timestamps correlating to each microvideo. The word microvideo might seem strange to anyone else but you're already acclimated to it from having watched the original Mega Microvideos and its sequel.
[00:00] - Yes You [03:17] - Clickerbait [07:11] - How to Enjoy Matthewmatosis [10:05] - One Purpose of Abstraction [12:45] - An Esoteric Text on Criticism [15:57] - Many Years Later [21:04] - Unrelated [24:04] - Seven Years Earlier [29:03} - Mega Microvideos: Revelations

media:group.media:title: Death Stranding Review
media:group.media:description:
It's not necessary to watch my Metal Gear review series before this but if you're interested in seeing some reviews of Kojima's previous games you can find those here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d5jBGtNVrS4&list=PLdg60-UktzB6NLg6C9-AVN1H5SXjo97xc
Source for the museum quote, I edited the punctuation to frame it better in the video: https://web.archive.org/web/20200728202434/https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/news240106kojimaart
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/matthewmatosis

entry.title: The Last of Us Part 2 Review

media:group.media:title: The Last of Us Part 2 Review
media:group.media:description:
My Last of Us 1 review can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eFhRFWSmFGg
I didn't want to censor the violence or profanity, as a result this video has limited ads. If you'd like to support me another way I'm on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/matthewmatosis
There's a tiny spoiler for Odin Sphere in this video too, not worth worrying about I think. There's a few instances of flashing lights but also probably not anything to worry about.

media:group.media:title: Recommending The Wonderful 101
media:group.media:description:
Some mild spoilers of early game events and a few strategies here. Probably nothing to worry about since I left a lot out. The 2D games in the middle are all Mega Drive games which support either the 3-button or 6-button controller.
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/matthewmatosis

media:group.media:title: Thoughts on Twinkle Star Sprites
media:group.media:description:
There are flashing lights in this video.
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/matthewmatosis

media:group.media:title: Viewtiful Joe Commentary
media:group.media:description:
This video follows on from my Devil May Cry Commentary which I recommend watching first, link below. There are flashing lights in the opening cutscene which could be a problem for some viewers.
Devil May Cry Commentary: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b5v7NLT5fS0 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/matthewmatosis
- Sources - Devil May Cry 2 under new management (Kamiya interview with 1UP about Ōkami, circa 2006): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TpdZUaUlvbw
Ōkami as Clover’s debut original title (I probably should’ve attributed this quote to Kamiya instead of Inaba but Inaba echos the sentiment further in): http://web.archive.org/web/20160220082156/http://shmuplations.com/okami/
Co-op was under consideration: https://web.archive.org/web/20060903125433/www.gamebunker.com/install/pages.php?id=80
Joe doesn’t look cool (Kamiya interview with 1UP about Ōkami, circa 2006, same as above): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TpdZUaUlvbw
HMD means His Master’s Dance (this can also be seen on a poster during the end credits): https://web.archive.org/web/20161030005624/https://twitter.com/PG_kamiya/status/41702143446487040
Mikami’s advice to focus on the good: http://web.archive.org/web/20180225140823/http://www.ign.com/articles/2017/06/06/the-future-of-platinumgames-ign-first
Kamen Rider influenced boss design: https://web.archive.org/web/20200103230228/https://twitter.com/PG_kamiya/status/250137692195676161
Slow Mo Fast Walking was added late in development (Kamiya’s Bayonetta commentary Chapter 3, Verse 7): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rzD-7Xm_VJI&feature=youtu.be&list=PLEYQ6LrlM_rGWmOvdvnyU1aS4VuqusAVu&t=263
Inaba on difficulty escalation (2016 GDC talk “Action Without Borders”): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wrw2IP6pZu0
Bayonetta at a lower speed (Hidekimatic Play from the PlatinumGames channel): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZKLgEV5DycU
VFX inspiration and Inaba’s ultimatums (Iwata Asks The Wonderful 101, Part 5): https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Iwata-Asks/Iwata-Asks-The-Wonderful-101-Hideki-Kamiya/The-Wonderful-101-Hideki-Kamiya/5-The-God-of-Video-Games-Descends/5-The-God-of-Video-Games-Descends-791139.html
V-Film placement (Iwata Asks The Wonderful 101, Part 3): https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Iwata-Asks/Iwata-Asks-The-Wonderful-101-Hideki-Kamiya/The-Wonderful-101-Hideki-Kamiya/3-Games-Hold-the-Answer/3-Games-Hold-the-Answer-791040.html
Inaba discusses Ōkami and Kamiya’s directorial style (Inaba interview with 1UP about Ōkami, circa 2006): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7U0I2H7hS9E
Objection: https://web.archive.org/web/20141008002609/http://www.officialnintendomagazine.co.uk/58163/features/interview-shu-takumi-on-the-phoenix-wright-trilogy/?page=2
Dante & Trish: https://web.archive.org/web/20200103231909/https://twitter.com/pg_kamiya/status/26431824683 https://web.archive.org/web/20191208154600/https://twitter.com/PG_kamiya/status/1203692978578919425

media:group.media:title: Mega Microvideos 2
media:group.media:description:
Only minimal spoilers throughout this video. Nothing I think is worth worrying about but if you're really concerned about a segment you can use the list below to skip to the next part. If you haven't seen the first Mega Microvideos I recommend watching that one before this one, link below.
Mega Microvideos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nHzqtvcGqXQ
Microvideo List: [00:00] - Another Alliteration [02:17] - Imitation Jewel [05:15] - Let's Not, Baby [08:54] - Doom is not Doom [13:06] - Both Eyes on the Prize [17:14] - Invasion of the Sequel Snatchers [20:31] - Phantom Sequel [23:45] - Critic's Latest Dilemma
Mikami's advice to focus on the good was brought up in this interview: http://web.archive.org/web/20180815201353/http://www.ign.com/articles/2017/06/06/the-future-of-platinumgames-ign-first
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/matthewmatosis

media:group.media:title: Breath of the Wild Review
media:group.media:description:
Some very minor spoilers for the other 3D Zelda games as well. You might want to pause to read some of the text that appears at points but if this is your first time watching I recommend just letting the video continue to play.
My previous Zelda reviews can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o908SWJ8ulc&list=PLdg60-UktzB7FOxFNrVBmNZN7jqhkQdIu
